channel.title: MavensMate Changelog
channel.description: Most recent changes with links to updates.

item.title: Version 0.2 beta
item.description:
Version 0.2 beta

This update addresses some major issues with mmserver where the server failed to respond appropriately to routine requests.

  • Adds install capability via "Plugins" menu item
  • Adds the ability to download logs and heap dumps
  • Fixes whitespace issues with jinja2 templates
